DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Different Lipid Emulsions Parenteral Nutrition Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: prematurity ( birth weight 500 1500 g ) postnatal age < = 72 h need cumulative parenteral energy supply least 70 % study duration sign informed consent form simultaneous participation another clinical study platelet count 50000 /ml cumulative enteral energy supply > 30 % study duration serious congenital infection and/or diseases serious metabolic disturbance severe cranial bleeding ( Papile III , IV ) need administration blood product contraindication iv lipid administration withdrawal consent
